Items.Description: An airship with a capacity of 13.  Not very good for combat.

Items.Name: Basic Weapon
Items.Description: Basic type of any weapon (no modifiers)

Items.Name: Boat
Items.Description: A water craft that carries 3 people and can cross still water

Items.Name: Dangerous Mushroom
Items.Description:
Requires a resilience roll:
-	Success: Heal 1d6 HP
-	Minor Success: Heal 1d6 HP but gain Poison
-	Fail: Gain Poison

Items.Name: Evil Grenade
Items.Description: A grenade that does 1d6 Dark damage

Items.Description: A grenade that does 1d6 Fire damage

Items.Name: Frost Grenade
Items.Description: A grenade that does 1d6 Ice damage

Items.Name: Helicopter
Items.Description: A flying craft that carries 4 people and can cross up to 8 areas before needing to land

Items.Name: Jetpack
Items.Description: Allows an individual to fly any distance outside of battle

Items.Name: Lazarus Tonic
Items.Description: Revives a fainted comrade in battle

Items.Name: Light Airship
Items.Description: A flying craft that carries 7 people and can cross long distances

Items.Name: Light Ship
Items.Description: A water craft that carries 11 people and can cross oceans

Items.Name: Lockpick
Items.Description: Picking a lock does not require a Tinker roll

Items.Name: Medicine
Items.Description: Heals 2d10 HP, but can only be used outside of battle

Items.Name: Rock Grenade
Items.Description: A grenade that does 1d6 Earth damage

Items.Name: Saintly Grenade
Items.Description: A grenade that does 1d6 Holy damage

Items.Name: Shock Grenade
Items.Description: A grenade that does 1d6 Lightning damage

Items.Name: Wind Grenade
Items.Description: A grenade that does 1d6 Air damage

Items.Name: Yacht
Items.Description: A water craft that carries 5 people and can cross oceans

Items.Name: Skinguard
Items.Description: Prevents Bleed twice before wearing off.

Items.Name: Eyeguard
Items.Description: Prevents Blind twice before wearing off.

Items.Name: Flameguard
Items.Description: Prevents Burn twice before wearing off.

Items.Name: Mindguard
Items.Description: Prevents Mania twice before wearing off.

Items.Name: Boneguard
Items.Description: Prevents Paralysis twice before wearing off.

Items.Name: Vaccine
Items.Description: Prevents Poison twice before wearing off.

Items.Name: Willguard
Items.Description: Prevents Scared twice before wearing off.

Bestiary.Description: A jellyfish with hard armor

Bestiary.Description: A rhinoceros with a thick metal hide

Charge: 1d12 damage

Ground Stomp: 1d8 damage to 2 enemies

Bestiary.Name: Baterina
Bestiary.Description: A giant bat with legs that wears a tutu

Bestiary.Description: A wingless dragon that can breathe underwater

Bestiary.Description: An armored figure wielding an axe that hangs out in swamps

Bestiary.Description: A scary unded creature.

Bestiary.Name: Brown Dragon
Bestiary.Description: Dragons the size of human beings with thick brown scales
Bestiary.Attacks:
Scratch: 1d8+3 damage

Bite: 1d8 damage.  Will latch onto a character causing the following: -1 to Movement Rolls and automatic 1d4 damage until free

Dirt Tail Whip: 1d6 ranged Earth damage plus causes Blind.

Bestiary.Name: Candlestick
Bestiary.Description: A sentient candlestick
Bestiary.Attacks:
Bonk: 1d12 + 3 damage.

Burn: 1d4 Fire damage to all enemies.

Bestiary.Name: Cave Driller
Bestiary.Description: A robotic tank with a drill that can dig in the earth.
Bestiary.Attacks:
Drill: 1d6+3 damage.

Sound Blast: 1d10-1 damage.  Causes Mania.

Bestiary.Name: Cave Tortoise`
Bestiary.Description: A brown tortoise with spikes on its back
Bestiary.Attacks:
Bite: 1d12 Earth damage.

Spike Shot: 1d6+1 Earth damage to all enemies.  Causes Bleed.

Bestiary.Name: Cave Troll
Bestiary.Description: A troll that lives in a cave.
Bestiary.Attacks:
Smash: 1d8+5 damage.

Frightening Stance: Causes Scared.

Bestiary.Name: Clay Pidgeon
Bestiary.Description: A pidgeon made of clay.

Bestiary.Name: Crystal Ninja
Bestiary.Description: A crystalline person with martial arts skills

Bestiary.Name: Crystal Squid
Bestiary.Description: A squid that can swim

Snap: 1d10 damage to a single player

Embrace: 1d4 damage.  Traps the player who must make a move to escape

Water Jet: 1d10 damage to all players

Bestiary.Description: A tall wolf with charcoal-like skin

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Big Ears
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Sense roll when listening to others' conversations

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Call of the Wild
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: Spend 1 SP to summon a Wolf to your side if in a forest.  Wolf has 4 HP and can do 1d6 damage and has its own turn during combat.

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Cavern Explorer
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Sense roll when inside a cave or cavern

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Chef
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Tinker for creating a delicious meal that will restore 1d4 HP or SP

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Detective
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Search when investigating a crime

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Good Shepherd
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Sense when attempting to wrangle a plant-eating animal

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Informed Traveller
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Knowledge roll for information about a city/town you haven't been to before

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: King Speech
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Diplomacy when speaking to rulers of nations

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Mountain Climber
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Brawn roll for climbing mountains

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Prosecutor
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Diplomacy when you try to convince others that someone is lying (whether it's true or not)

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Natural Athlete
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Brawn when competing in an athletic event

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Entomologist
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Search when searching for bugs

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Tundra Explorer
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Search when in cold climates

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Executioner
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Melee when intending to kill an enemy

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Bard
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Diplomacy when doing an acting or musical performance
